channel.title: Maureen Flynn on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: ISBA 2016: Reframing respite - Maureen Flynn
item.description: DM - Donald Macleod MF - Maureen Flynn DM It is now my pleasure to introduce Maureen Flynn, who is Project Officer and Transition Support Co-ordinator with Interchange Illawarra Incorporated in New South Wales, Australia. Maureen will talk to us about the transformational changes taking place throughout Australia with a move to individualised funding packages of support for people with disability, their families and carers. It’s known as consumer directed care.
